includedAssets.synopsis: Spartan king Gerard Butler leads his brave elite warriors against the all-conquering Persian invaders. Bloody retelling of Frank Miller's graphic novel.

includedAssets.title: 300: Rise Of An Empire
includedAssets.synopsis: Greek general Thermistocles leads the charge against an invading Persian army in this action extravaganza. Starring Sullivan Stapleton and Eva Green.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Greek general Thermistocles leads the charge against an invading Persian army in this action extravaganza. Starring Sullivan Stapleton and Eva Green.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Greek general Thermistocles leads the charge against an invading Persian army in this action extravaganza. Starring Sullivan Stapleton and Eva Green.
includedAssets.guidanceText: flashing images, strong language, mature themes, sex, violence

includedAssets.title: 300 Movie Box Set
includedAssets.synopsis: Spartan King Leonidas (Gerard Butler) leads an army of 300 men against the 300,000-strong forces of the Persian 'god-King' Xerxes, while Themistocles (Sullivan Stapleton) engages in a bloody sea battle with the cunning Persian naval commander Artemisia (Eva Green). Fantasy action from Zack Snyder, based on the Frank Miller comic series.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Bloody fantasy action from Zack Snyder, based on the Frank Miller comic series, and starring Gerard Butler and Eva Green.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Spartan King Leonidas (Gerard Butler) leads an army of 300 men against the 300,000-strong forces of the Persian 'god-King' Xerxes, while Themistocles (Sullivan Stapleton) engages in a bloody sea battle with the cunning Persian naval commander Artemisia (Eva Green). Fantasy action from Zack Snyder, based on the Frank Miller comic series.

includedIn.synopsis: A fearsome Spartan leads an army of 300 deadly warriors against the 300,000-strong forces of the mysterious Persian 'god-King' in order to protect his city, while a Greek general engages in a bloody sea battle with a cunning Persian naval commander.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A fearsome Spartan leads an army of 300 against the forces of a Persian 'god-King', while a Greek general engages a cunning naval commander.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A fearsome Spartan leads an army of 300 deadly warriors against the 300,000-strong forces of the mysterious Persian 'god-King' in order to protect his city, while a Greek general engages in a bloody sea battle with a cunning Persian naval commander.
